vn.tki.erp.cambpm.core

Class CubaApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.tki.erp.cambpm.core.ProcessApplication

  • @Component(value="app")
public class CubaApp
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is loaded when cuba application start with the bean name of "app".
    It provides methods to access cuba application from Bpm engine through expression in bpmn file.
    For example, in user task form field, we can get the entity property like this: ${app.getEntity(execution).getName()}
    or current logged in username can retrieve like this: ${app.getCurrentUser().getLogin()}

      • getEntity

        public com.haulmont.cuba.core.entity.Entity<?> getEntity(org.camunda.bpm.engine.delegate.DelegateExecution execution)
        Parameters:
        execution - Camunda Delegate Execution. This function normally is used in task form field. Example expression:
        ${app.getEntity(execution).getName()}
        Returns:
        Processing entity object, which entity key stored in business key of the process instance.
